p: Metabolic rate simulations for 109 g pikas fell within the range empirically derived by MacArthur and Wang ( 1973) for a variety of body postures and fur properties (Fig. 2). Niche Mapper simulated an upper critical temperature threshold (FMR = BMR) of ~25°C, which is similar to observed values (MacArthur and Wang 1973; Smith 1974).
